collectionMetadata.name: Motivations to Participate in Sport / Physical Activity (2022)
collectionMetadata.description:
Source: National Sports Participation Survey (NSPS). 
NSPS is a nationwide survey conducted by Sport Singapore to track sport and physical activity participation amongst Singapore Residents aged 13+ years, with data collected continuously across the year and with robust annual sample sizes of at least 4,500 and weighted to reflect the population. 

This data shows the motivations for participating in sports and physical activities (among residents who participated).

datasetMetadata.name: Motivations to Participate in Sport / Physical Activity (2021)
